item.description:
Both of these movies got good reviews.

West Boylston Cinema, Route 12, near the WalMart

Anna Karenina (Classic, 140 min, starts at 7:00): http://www.westboylstoncinema.com/Movie56k.asp?Movie=3

We'll meet in the lobby 5 minutes before show time (with all the ads, we're sure not to miss anything while saying our hellos).

Â 

As of now, I'm dropping "Looper," as there hasn't been any interest.

Looper (Sci-Fi, 120 min, starts at 9:35): http://www.westboylstoncinema.com/Movie56k.asp?Movie=10
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby, wearing a red turtleneck and blue jeans.
item.name: Let's Check Out a Movie (or two)
